## SubdivisionScheme interface

Interface representing a `SubdivisionScheme`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SubdivisionScheme 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getLevelDimensionX(level)](./harp-geoutils.subdivisionscheme.getleveldimensionx.md) | Returns the width of the partitions at the given level. |
|  [getLevelDimensionY(level)](./harp-geoutils.subdivisionscheme.getleveldimensiony.md) | Returns the height of the partitions at the given level. |
|  [getSubdivisionX(level)](./harp-geoutils.subdivisionscheme.getsubdivisionx.md) | Returns the number of columns for the given level. |
|  [getSubdivisionY(level)](./harp-geoutils.subdivisionscheme.getsubdivisiony.md) | Returns the number of rows for the given level. |
